div.p: This work was developed in the context of the COPAN project on Coevolutionary Pathways in the Earth system at the Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research. The authors are grateful for financial support from the Heinrich-Böll-Foundation, the Stordalen Foundation (via the Planetary Boundaries Research Network PB.net), the Earth League’s EarthDoc program, the Leibniz Association (project DOMINOES) and the Swedish Research Council Formas (Project Grant 2014-589). We thank David Collste, Jobst Heitzig, Antoine Levesque, Finn Müller-Hansen and Maja Schlüter for discussions and comments on the manuscript.
